list.abs: 脊髓痨(Tabes Dorsalis),也被称为局部运动共济失调(locomotor ataxia),常常导致缓慢步态(shuffling gait)。心血管并发症包括梅毒性大动脉炎、主动脉瘤、主动脉窦动脉.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek, from a- 'without' + taxis 'order'. The original sense was 'irregularity, disorder', later (in medical use) denoting irregularity of function or symptoms

means.word_mean: 1. inability to coordinate voluntary muscle movements; unsteady movements and staggering gait
